description: Avalanche Wong is the only surviving member of the http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Magicians Guild]. He lives in Neo Hong Hong (Kaulun). http://anidb.net/ch25715 [Lum Cheng] is his granddaughter, thus he is probably also somehow related to http://anidb.net/ch25782 [Genvara Cheng]. He is very old and of short stature; his eyes are never visible.
name: Avalanche Wong
